@_Rich wrote:

Make sure you correctly added the model into the client and used ‘add model’ in-game. Also the code you showed us doesn’t show vengeance actionbutton, it shows the Vengeance recoiling.

item.title: PRIMA AND H4RD look on this veng prob REP++ WHO HELPED! (int actionbutton)
item.dc:creator: @mopar_sex_scape mopar sex scape
item.description:
@mopar_sex_scape wrote:

primadude and h4rd and much more coders look at this about veng problem i need help about client not comeing the veng it comes a eye ball and splash :S this is what i find in client

} } client player = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId]; if (mage.vengon && hitDiff != 0 && !splash) { player.hitDiff = (int)(hitDiff / 1.2); // Simple math, 100 divided by 1.30, and you get 76. player.currentHealth -= (int)(hitDiff / 1.2); player.hitUpdateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you. player.updateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you. player.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you. mage.vengon = false; mage.plrText = "Taste vengeance!"; // This says it in itself. mage.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; // Make sure the txt4 will update. }

and this is what i find in class 23 i download primadude models i think i got from class 23 my models id are 12411 anything wrong just leave message thx

break; case 442: /* GFX ID veng */ originalDataID = 354; // you can change this , this id makes it spin gfx.anInt405 = 12411; /* Model ID 12411*/ break;

} } client player = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId]; if (mage.vengon && hitDiff != 0 && !splash) { player.hitDiff = (int)(hitDiff / 1.2); // Simple math, 100 divided by 1.30, and you get 76. player.currentHealth -= (int)(hitDiff / 1.2); player.hitUpdateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you. player.updateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you. player.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you. mage.vengon = false; mage.plrText = "Taste vengeance!"; // This says it in itself. mage.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; // Make sure the txt4 will update. }

this is what i find in client :S i dont think it is good – i am very bad on clients
